desc: Unicode to images

Start of string
.
ğŸ’© test __1__
.

.


End of string
.
test __2__ ğŸ’©
.
<p>test <strong>2</strong> <img class="emojione" alt="ğŸ’©" src="/img/1f4a9.svg?v=2.0.1"/></p>
.

.
aaa ğŸ’© bbb ğŸ˜€ ccc ğŸˆ ddd
.

Unknown name
.
ğŸ’© :qwerty:
.

.
ğŸ˜„  test âœŒğŸ¼ wasd ğŸ˜„   lorem1 0  __1__
.
